  • better prices for Internet access during your travels abroad

sdsdsadsa

Purpose:


To find a place for "all Polarion team" in Prague that will provide collaborative environment, keep teams together and allow us to grow in future. Our virtues like collaboration, agility and scalability should reflect new office space.
Requirements:
Functional (High-Pri evaluation criteria):
- Keep teams together:
- R&D on same floor - 5 spaces for teams of up-to 10 persons(tems need to sit together in enclosed environment to colabarate).
- Possibility to have space for eventual visitors (Jiri, Jan, Robert, …)
- IT room (servers and storage for computer components)
- Support room(s). Eventually on the same floor to be well connected with Omega
- Support/IT teams should sit in separate rooms so they don't disturb each other
- Space should allow flexibility and collaboration of “open office” and team unity while in same time providing dividers (visual and sound - glass/concrete wall for instance)
- modular setup of space so we can  customise and change it based on need
- Have 3 small "call rooms" 6-8 m2 (2-4 people, one round desk)
- Have one medium size meeting room 30 m2 - we should have a separate room for meeting with visitors/external people
- UTP Cat6 cabling to all desks (or possibility for us to redo the cabling)
- WiFi connectivity in place with enough enterprise level access points (or possibility for us to install our own APs) (all Polarion area)
- at least 50 Mbps  internet (1:1) (upload/download of large datasets -> releases, customer dumps, etc)
- Separate toilets for male/female. 10-15 people/toilet(sit)
- Adequate Server Room

  • Adequate Server Room (Able to fit comfortably 4 racks of servers (width should be more than 2m)
  • min. 2 redundant, independent, enterprise level air conditioning units to keep constant low temperature
  • Properly secured access (cards, secure doors, camera, alarm).
  • Space for storage of Hardware components


Functional (Mid-Pri evaluation criteria)
- Windows (enough light). Windows should be openable
- Airconditioning/heating available (per room if posible so each room can regulate it)


- Availability of parking slots (10 are minimum) - reserved/dedicated if posible
- Quiet environment (low level of noise outside of immediate team, helps people focus and work)
- Manager offices (to fit 1-2 person, for people managers to accommodate 1:1 personal meetings):

- R&D: Sinisa + …
- IT: Martin(?) + ...
- well connected area that has metro and/or multiple connections (closer to city center)

- restaurants available with in vicinity (walking distance)

- Secure access to the premises (doors locked with cards, 24x7 guards on the entrance, alarm etc.)
